ui_surfaces.navigation_path: System > Reports > Device Discovery or Profiler > Dashboard and Report > Device Discovery report
Profiler > Dashboard and Report > Device Discovery report

inputs.name: Records per page
inputs.help_text: Customize the number of records displayed per page.

inputs.name: Search
inputs.help_text: Search devices based on attributes like MAC Address, IP Address, etc.

inputs.name: Advanced Search
inputs.help_text: Enter expressions with operators and wildcards for specific search results.

inputs.name: Approve/Unapprove selected devices
inputs.help_text: Manually approve or unapprove selected devices.

inputs.name: Time-Bound Approve Selected Devices
inputs.help_text: Approve devices for a specified time period by setting start and end dates.

inputs.name: Add Device
inputs.help_text: Add new devices with attributes like MAC Address, Manufacturer, Operating System, etc.

inputs.name: Download Report
inputs.help_text: Download the report in CSV or PDF format.

inputs.name: Delete Selected
inputs.help_text: Delete selected devices from the report.

inputs.name: Purge Aged Out Devices
inputs.help_text: Manually purge devices older than the specified interval.

inputs.name: Edit this device
inputs.help_text: Edit attributes like Manufacturer, Category, and Operating System for a specific device.

inputs.name: Edit all similar devices
inputs.help_text: Edit attributes for all devices with the same fingerprint.

inputs.name: Submit a ticket
inputs.help_text: Send information about wrongly classified devices to Pulse Secure for verification.

inputs.name: Override Device Approval Status
inputs.help_text: Prevent updates to the approval status of a device.

steps: Navigate to System > Reports > Device Discovery
View the Device Discovery Report Table
Perform actions like approve, unapprove, add, edit, or delete devices
Download the report in desired format
workflows.visual_representation: Table with device attributes and action buttons

steps: Select a device from the Device Discovery Report Table
Edit attributes like Manufacturer, Category, and Operating System
Submit tickets for classification issues if necessary
workflows.visual_representation: Device details section with edit and submit options
